list.name: Default
list.comment: Updated rendering to account for textures and 3D views. Note: This is currently in a very fragile and temporary state. Will be updated ASAP.

task.summary: Copied and slightly modified legacy vector util classes.
Vars for graphics settings, ini4j added.
Fixed a bug on OSX Implemented timesteps
Removed legacy vector math in favor of JOML
Initialized GLFW before threads start Refactored timesteps to use GLFW time Added a Window system General cleanliness.
Added some simple elements for GUI
Added mesh combining for batch rendering. Added a parent object for GUI elements Added GUI batch combining
